DOC.brief_summary: This study open-label , single-dose , parallel group study evaluate effect age gender pharmacokinetics , safety , tolerability HCV-796 administer orally healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects Age & Gender PK , Safety & Tolerability HCV-796 Administered Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Men nonlactating nonpregnant woman , age 18 45 , > 65 year . Men must agree practice barrier contraception 12 week last test article administration . Estimated ( calculate ) creatinine clearance must within ageappropriate normal range . Exclusion : History seizure . History rhabdomyolysis . History thyroid disease .
